F5 Terraform Resources
========================

Welcome to F5 Resources for Terraform.

Terraform can manage infrastructure including low-level components like compute instances, storage, and networking,
as well as high-level components like DNS entries, SaaS features, and more.

:doc:`Get started with F5 Terraform Resources <overview>`.



.. _revision-history:

Document Revision History
--------------------------

This page shows the revision history for this documentation.
See `GitHub <https://github.com/F5Networks/terraform-provider-bigip/releases>`_ for release information.

========== ============================================================================================== =====================
Doc Rev    Description                                                                                    Date
========== ============================================================================================== =====================
1.8        Updated :doc:`Configuring Terraform </userguide/configuring>` with corrected sample code       03-09-23
           syntax and resource name.
1.7        Updated version charts. Added sections for :ref:`awaf-integration` and                         09-18-22
           :ref:`fast-integration`.
1.6        Updated version charts. Added section :ref:`bigip-modules-gcp`.                                07-07-21
1.5        Added new section: :ref:`bigip-modules`.                                                       01-20-21
1.4        Updated the version table.                                                                     08-06-20
1.3        Updates to :ref:`as3-integration` and :ref:`do-integration`.                                   06-23-20
1.2        Added section on :ref:`bigiq-licensing`. Added a page linking to :ref:`release-notes`.         06-16-20
1.1        Added section on :ref:`as3-integration`. Added section on :ref:`do-integration`.               04-15-20
           Added information about our Slack channel to the :ref:`support` page.
1.0        Initial release of Terraform documentation.                                                    10-02-19
========== ============================================================================================== =====================
